data.title: Small's Mortuary & Cremation Services, Inc.
data.meta_description: Johnny ?Warb? Wright, born August 18, 1939, departed this life on Wednesday, December 12, 2012. He leaves to cherish his loving memories, his devoted daughter Patricia Brown of Junction City, KS; son, Derek Wright(Jody) of Isilanti, MI; five grandchildren; one great granddaughter; 6 sisters; 2 brothers; 3 aunts; a host of nieces, nephews, other relatives and friends. His remains will lie in state on Tuesday, December 18, 2012 from 1pm until 8pm at Small?s Mortuary, Mobile, AL. Visitation will be held on Wednesday, December 19, 2012 from 9am until the 11am funeral hour at Small?s Mortuary Chapel. Interment will follow in Whispering Pines Cemetery DIGNIFIED AND PROFESSIONAL SERVICES ENTRUSTED TO SMALL'S MORTUARY, 950 S. BROAD ST., MOBILE, AL 36603.
